metadata.Title: CVE-2021-27097 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: The boot loader in Das U-Boot before 2021.04-rc2 mishandles a modified FIT.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This fix changes behaviour and would introduce regressions in existing installations. We will not be fixing this issue in Ubuntu stable releases. See here for an example: https://lore.kernel.org/lkml/20210409192128.3998606-1-nathan@kernel.org/ https://www.linux4sam.org/bin/view/Linux4SAM/HasherrorwhenbootingFITimage https://github.com/linux4sam/dt-overlay-at91/commit/7ad311899af48efbb43f0e3ac935da5981bd4b2d  b6f4c757959f8850e1299a77c8e5713da78e8ec0 is the complete patch set that fixes both CVE-2021-27097 and CVE-2021-27138

criterions.comment: u-boot: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
